name: yerror
description: It helps to know why you got an error.

scripts.coveralls: ./node_modules/istanbul/lib/cli.js cover ./node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha --report lcovonly -- tests/*.mocha.js -R spec -t 5000 && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | ./node_modules/coveralls/bin/coveralls.js && rm -rf ./coverage

author: Nicolas Froidure (Simplifield)
